snippet: The United States says Iran was unwilling to agree to a unified proposal, while Iran says France thwarted progress.
abstract: Iran and Western powers disagree over why nuclear talks failed, with United States saying Iran was unwilling to agree to unified proposal and Iran claiming that France thwarted progress.
lead_paragraph: The United States says Iran was unwilling to agree to a unified proposal, while Iran says France thwarted progress.

headline.main: Iran and Western Powers Clash Over Why Nuclear Talks Failed
headline.print_headline: Iran and Western Powers Clash Over Why Nuclear Talks Failed
